law.catch_line: A physician who believes that a patient under the physician's care has an occupational disease shall...

text.section: A physician who believes that a patient under the physician's care has an occupational disease shall submit a report to the Secretary and the Secretary of Health and Mental Hygiene.

The report shall:
State the name, address, occupation, and place of employment of the patient;
Identify the suspected disease; and
Contain any other information that the Secretary requires.
The Secretary shall give the information received under this section to the Commissioner of Labor and Industry.
